title: Voice of Nimrodel (3C28)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Tale. Skirmish: Exert an Elf at a river or forest to cancel a skirmish involving that Elf.
Lore:	”'Beside the falls of Nimrodel, / By water clear and cool, / Her voice as falling silver fell / Into the shining pool.'”
Rarity:	C
